Package game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ball
    Creates a ball.
    BallTest
    Creates a ball.
    Box
    Creates a square.
    Boxes
    Creates a square.
    Character
    Creates a character with the appearance of a robot.
    Collision
    Handles the interaction between the bodies shapes.
    ControlPanel
    Generates and handles buttons' actions such as 'Skip Level' or 'Restart'.
    Game
    Initialises the game by creating a window frame to play the game within.
    GameLevel
    An abstract class which constructs a basis for the 'LevelOne', 'LevelTwo', 'LevelThree' and 'LevelFour' classes which enables the game levels to change.
    LevelFour
    Class used to initialise the fourth level of the game.
    LevelOne
    Class used to initialise the first level of the game.
    LevelThree
    Class used to initialise the third level of the game.
    LevelTwo
    Class used to initialise the second level of the game.
    mouseMovement
    Enables the user to control the 'Character' class instance by moving the mouse around the game window.
    MyView
    Displays the user's score, lives left, background images and text on the game window.
    PowerUp
    Creates a circle.
    Puppet
    Creates a polygon shape with an image attached.
    Rectangle
    Creates a rectangle.
    Restart
    Restarts the current level if the user presses the specified key.
    Score
    Stores user scores and finds the highest score achieved by the user.
    Time
    Creates a timer which starts once the game is executed.
